message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,300,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial deal.  Let me know your thoughts.

I'm interested in the product, but $1,300,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be comfortable with the price.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your position.  While $1,150,000 is a bit lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $1,225,000? This price still allows me to make a good profit while being within your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,225,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,200,000, which is the price I was originally willing to pay for the product from John. I'm hoping we can meet at this price.
